channel.title: How to Remove tutorial cutscene on 667/704
channel.description:
[B]/* how to remove cutscean/tutorial on 667/704 */[/B]
First go to ControlerHandler.java
Find [CODE]Class<Controler> value5 = (Class<Controler>) Class // // I don't think one is needed doesnt hurt to try :)[/CODE]
and underneath that replace [CODE].forName(ZGDControler.class.getCanonicalName()); [/CODE]
with [CODE].forName(Duelarena.class.getCanonicalName());[/CODE]
do the same for [CODE]Class<Controler> value6 = (Class<Controler>) Class[/CODE]
Now open DialougeHandler.java and find
[CODE]Class<Dialogue> value19 = (Class<Dialogue>) Class[/CODE]
Underneath that replace [CODE]forName(QuestGuide.class.getCanonicalName());[/CODE] with [CODE].forName(SimpleMessage.class.getCanonicalName());[/CODE]
Lastly go to "QuestGuide.java" and delete everything in that file, save and exit.
Compile everything and you should have 0 errors.
All credits to me :)
PS, I am IcyPhat, I posted this on R-S, my mopar account does not work!

item.title: How to Remove tutorial cutscene on 667/704
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“Humid, post:8, topic:437336”][quote author=zingerman111 link=topic=540044.msg3956360#msg3956360 date=1332795605]
players arent able to attack or anything after they start
[/quote]

yeah, i got that error[/quote]

I haven’t seen the file, but i’m assuming there are booleans that are updated during the cutscene. You will have to find all of those, and manually set them to true.

Read full topic
